config.description: The configuration parameters for the identity provider. To view the required parameters for a specific provider, refer to our [developer documentation](https://developers.cloudflare.com/cloudflare-one/identity/idp-integration/).

name.description: The name of the identity provider, shown to users on the login page.

type.description: The type of identity provider. To determine the value for a specific provider, refer to our [developer documentation](https://developers.cloudflare.com/cloudflare-one/identity/idp-integration/).
